[`func deleteBackward(Any?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsstandardkeybindingresponding/deletebackward(_:))Deletes content moving backward from the current insertion point.[`func deleteBackwardByDecomposingPreviousCharacter(Any?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsstandardkeybindingresponding/deletebackwardbydecomposingpreviouscharacter(_:))[`func deleteForward(Any?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsstandardkeybindingresponding/deleteforward(_:))[`func deleteToBeginningOfLine(Any?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsstandardkeybindingresponding/deletetobeginningofline(_:))Deletes content from the insertion point to the beginning of the current line.[`func deleteToBeginningOfParagraph(Any?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsstandardkeybindingresponding/deletetobeginningofparagraph(_:))Deletes content from the insertion point to the beginning of the current paragraph.[`func deleteToEndOfLine(Any?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsstandardkeybindingresponding/deletetoendofline(_:))Deletes content from the insertion point to the end of the current line.[`func deleteToEndOfParagraph(Any?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsstandardkeybindingresponding/deletetoendofparagraph(_:))Deletes content from the insertion point to the end of the current paragraph.[`func deleteWordBackward(Any?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsstandardkeybindingresponding/deletewordbackward(_:))Deletes the word preceding the current insertion point.[`func yank(Any?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsstandardkeybindingresponding/yank(_:))Deletes the current selection, placing it in a temporary buffer, such as the Clipboard.
